channel.title: Comments on: Psychonauts
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: I had no idea he was making another game... Thanks for mentioning it. I hope they come out with a PC version eventually.
item.content:encoded: I had no idea he was making another game… Thanks for mentioning it. I hope they come out with a PC version eventually.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
The whole milkman conspiracy stage was worth the price of admission. And then the Lungfishopolis stage... oh, man, that was hilarious.
Now I've upgraded my hopes for Brutal Legend from "cautiously optimistic" to "excited".
item.content:encoded:
The whole milkman conspiracy stage was worth the price of admission. And then the Lungfishopolis stage… oh, man, that was hilarious.

Now I’ve upgraded my hopes for Brutal Legend from “cautiously optimistic” to “excited”.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Unfortunately, I think you're the only other person I know who has played this game....
I'm really glad I picked this one up. It's like a dozen different games in one. I still crack up thinking about moments in this game.
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately, I think you’re the only other person I know who has played this game….

I’m really glad I picked this one up. It’s like a dozen different games in one. I still crack up thinking about moments in this game.
